description.default: Tomato timer in status bar, Q&A in AI knowledge base, photo flash thought, streaming AI, database backlink, bottom backlink, text to quote, flashcard priority, document merge, regular reminder, reading point, bidirectional interlinking, deleting flashcards during review, flashcard image blanking, move to today's notes, clean up invalid flashcards, long content tool.
